title: Kartoffelsuppe nach Bayrischer Art (Bavarian Potato Soup)

Ingredients.2: 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, or to taste

Ingredients.12: 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste

Ingredients.13: 1 pinch dried marjoram, or to taste

Ingredients.14: 1 pinch sweet paprika, or to taste

Ingredients.15: 1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste

Directions.1: Place sausages in a small pot and cover with water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until no longer pink in the center, 10 to 15 minutes. Drain. Cut into slices.

Directions.2: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Cook potatoes in hot oil, stirring often, until they start to crisp on the edges, about 8 minutes. Stir in carrots, onions, leek, scallions, and garlic.

Directions.3: Dissolve vegetable bouillon in hot water; pour into the pot. Season soup with salt, black pepper, marjoram, paprika, and nutmeg. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and cook, covered, until carrots are tender, about 30 minutes.

Directions.4: Stir sausage slices, parsley, and chives into soup. Simmer until flavors combine, about 5 minutes. Stir in sour cream just before serving.
